content: the sea shells by the sea shore market bag is a fun pattern that has a unique look provided by the shell like puff easy and works up quickly this bag will be your summer beach or market place go-to bag approximately 14 tall without handles x 15 wide pattern as written will accommodate the older caron cotton cakes yardage with 2 balls if you would like to use the new caron cotton cakes with more yardage you would be able to make the bag larger and add rounds to the sides of the bag with just 1 of the cakes bag is worked in the round in one piece the sides of the bag are a 4 row repeat stitches used are double_crochet single_crochet and puff the unique shell like appearance of the puff is made by working over a previous double_crochet a fun and unique puff complete video tutorial is available at https //youtu be/6e5w0wmb67c join fellow crocheters in my crochet a long group on facebook https //www facebook com/groups/829792060522798/ follow me on instagram https //www instagram com/nanascraftyhome/ sign up for my newsletter https //nanascraftyhome com/sign-up-for-my-free-newsletter/
